ProductInfo.Features:

<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 55-250mm II Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Filters + Tripod + Accessory Kit
